# EventFunc delegate

```csharp
public delegate void EventFunc(IntPtr @event, IntPtr data);
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| event | Transfer ownership: none |
| data | Transfer ownership: none; Nullable: true |

Transfer ownership: none
